description: Verify that the user can assign a member to a Trello card successfully
preconditions: User must be logged in to Trello
expected_result: Member is successfully assigned to the specified card

steps.action: Create TestObject for Assign members option
Create TestObject for close popover button

test_case_name: Assign Member and Verify Member Avatar in Card
description: Verify that user can assign a member to a Trello card and member avatar appears in the card detail section.
preconditions: User must be logged in to Trello
Member 'Lê Thị Thanh Ngân' must be an available member in workspace
expected_result: Member is assigned successfully and member avatar appears inside the card detail view.

description: Verify that user can remove an assigned member from a Trello card successfully.
preconditions: User must be logged in to Trello
Member 'Lê Thị Thanh Ngân' must already be assigned to this card
expected_result: Assigned member is removed from the card and avatar no longer appears in the card detail.

steps.action: Create TestObject for Remove Member option
Create TestObject for removed member avatar

test_case_name: Search and Select Member in Trello Card
description: Verify that user can search for a member inside the 'Assign Members' popup and successfully select that member.
preconditions: User must be logged in to Trello
Member 'Lê Thị Thanh Ngân' must exist in workspace
expected_result: User can search and select the member successfully inside Assign Members popup.

steps.action: Wait for search field and input text

test_case_name: Save Button Disabled When Comment Is Empty
description: Verify that the Save button remains disabled when the comment input is empty.
preconditions: User must be logged in to Trello
User must be able to open comment editor
expected_result: Save button is disabled and user cannot submit an empty comment.

steps.action: Create TestObject for Write Comment button
Wait for Save button to become visible

description: Verify that the user can successfully edit an existing comment on a Trello card.
preconditions: A comment already exists on the card to be edited

test_data.new_comment_text: Tôi đã chỉnh sửa bình luận thành công!

expected_result: Comment is updated and new content is displayed successfully.

steps.action: Clear old text and type new text
steps.data: Tôi đã chỉnh sửa bình luận thành công!

test_case_name: Verify Save button is disabled/hidden when editing comment with empty content
description: Ensure that Trello does not allow saving an edited comment when the content is empty. The Save button must not appear or must remain disabled.
preconditions: A comment already exists to be edited
expected_result: Save button should NOT appear when the edited comment is empty.

steps.action: Locate Edit button of existing comment
Clear all content using CTRL+A + DELETE
Verify Save button is NOT present

description: Verify that the user can delete an existing comment from a Trello card.
preconditions: A comment with known content already exists for deletion

test_data.comment_text_to_delete: Tôi đã làm được ze ze

expected_result: The selected comment is deleted and no longer visible on the card.

steps.action: Verify deleted comment no longer appears

description: Verify that when the user clicks Delete on a comment but cancels the deletion in the confirmation popover, the comment remains visible.
preconditions: A comment with content 'aa' already exists on the card
expected_result: Deletion is canceled and the comment remains visible on the card.

steps.expected: Test case passed: Comment deletion canceled successfully

test_case_name: List All Comments Displayed on the Card
description: Verify that all comments on a Trello card are retrieved and displayed in the UI correctly.
preconditions: Card contains one or more comments
expected_result: All comments on the card are listed and visible on the UI.

steps.action: Retrieve all comment texts using WebUI.findWebElements

steps.expected: Comment list is not empty and matches UI
